title: American Base in Jordan Where Drone Killed 3 U.S. Troops Dogged by Inadequate Air Defenses
description:
The lack of capabilities to detect and destroy air attacks was well known at Tower 22, said troops stationed at the small outpost.

The post American Base in Jordan Where Drone Killed 3 U.S. Troops Dogged by Inadequate Air Defenses appeared first on The Intercept.

title: ICE’s Use of Solitary Confinement "Only Increasing" Under Biden
description:
A new report reveals that ICE continues to isolate immigrants en masse, including many with known mental health conditions.

The post ICE’s Use of Solitary Confinement “Only Increasing” Under Biden appeared first on The Intercept.
